title: MCQ
body: A multiple choice question items each have a text attribute and whether the item is correct. An MCQ can also set the items to display in a random order and allow multiple items to be selected.
instruction: What does MCQ standard for? Select an item below and click submit.

_feedback.correct: This feedback will appear if you answered the question correctly.

_incorrect.final: This feedback will appear if you answered the question incorrectly.

_partlyCorrect.final: This feedback will appear if you answered part of the question correctly.
